overview:
Aanand brings over 20 years of experience in executive search to the Calibre One team. He leads assignments across the software, internet, and technology sectors.

Aanand has an inside perspective to executive search having spent 14 years as the head of talent for large corporations such as VMware, AppLabs, and Palm where he aggressively grew teams within the U.S. and internationally. While at VMware, Aanand grew the company organically from 200 people, through a successful acquisition and then an IPO, to over 10,000 globally. During that time, revenues increased from 3M to 2B. Since then, heâ€™s been working with marquee clients including Pandora, Palantir, Nicira, Solar City, Coraid, Nimbula and Medallia.

In addition to an extensive executive search background, Aanand brings significant experience in staffing operations and recruiting processes. Aanand spent his undergraduate education studying Biology at the University of California San Diego and is currently studying business at Notre Dame de Namur University.

In his personal time, he competes in vintage automobile racing and enjoys boating on the bay. He loves spending weekends with his wife and son at their home in Belmont, California and in the local mountains.
